Title: Five ways I handled my OutOfMemoryErrors
Description: I use Grafana to create graphs that show me various business and performance metrics for Bank Statement Converter. One of the graphs I created tracks the number of Internal Server Errors the server returns to its clients. I do this by writing a record into the database whenever a 500 is sent to the client. This graph has been really helpful for ironing out bugs I didn‚Äôt anticipate. Last Thursday at 12:55 AM HKT my servers started throwing Java‚Äôs infamous OutOfMemoryErrors.
